About P+P

Creating beautiful, functional spaces.

I have 10 years experience as an interior designer and project manager for high-end residential, commercial and hospitality projects. Through the years I've worked on a wide range of projects including - residential homes and condos in Mt Pleasant, several large scale homes on Kiawah Island, an expansive 10,000 sqft home in the Connecticut, large commercial buildings, healthcare facilities, banks, and even a handful of boutique hotels in Charleston.

I can make your residential or commercial project beautiful one space at a time, even one wall at a time working within your budget. My passion for interior design comes from the desire to create beautiful spaces for clients that are filled with color, texture, style and function.

I've always loved working with Renee. She is extremely talented and has a great eye for any space. She listens, gets to know her client, does her research and presents options in a very reasonable timeframe.

Jenn S, Mount Pleasant, SC

Work with Me

Online or locally. It's up to you.

From my etsy shop, I am able to offer you custom interior design services through an online process that caters directly to your needs - as if you were meeting with me in person. If you prefer to work with me locally, no problem! Contact me to set up a an appointment so we can discuss your project.

visit etsy shop

What a joy it has been working with Renee. She read me perfectly and gently guided me to a bit more updated look while still remaining true to the look we were aiming for. She is very organized, efficient, and quick to respond to any questions. We love everything that we have done with her - she has created a fresh, new look for our home.

Jan S, Isle of Palms, SC
